title: Vogue (magazine)
summary: Vogue is an American monthly fashion and lifestyle magazine that covers many topics, including fashion, beauty, culture, living, and runway. Based in New York City, it began as a weekly newspaper in 1892 before becoming a monthly magazine years later. Since starting up in 1892, Vogue has featured numerous actors, actresses, musicians, models, gymnasts, etc. The largest issue to be published by Vogue magazine was published in September 2012, containing 900 pages.
